Package clientSide.stubs

Class KitchenStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.KitchenStub
  • public class KitchenStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the kitchen. It instantiates a remote reference to the kitchen. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
    Author:
    Martim Neves, Tiago Dias

    • Constructor Summary

      Stub instantiation.
